alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 6:29PM MST until August 16 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 715 PM MST. * At 628 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Casas Adobes, or near Oro Valley, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oro Valley, Marana, Casas Adobes, Flowing Wells and Tortolita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
